dance.name: Roulette
dance.music: 3 x (16 + 24) +16 bar jigs (3 x AABB + AA), esp. Roulette
dance.notes:
A roulette is "the curve described by a point (called the generator or pole) attached to a given curve as it rolls without slipping along a second given curve that is fixed." (Wikipedia) Remember Spirograph?
Note that the B parts in the music are broken into 6 bar phrases and not the normal 4 bar ones.
Experienced dancers should not touch hands when passing each other in the centre of the set. Beginners may want to touch hands to assist in orientation when learning the dance.

position.call: All circle left, slip step
Back-to-back with partner, right shoulder
All circle right, slip step
Back-to-back with partner, right shoulder

Men briefly touch right hands (pass right shoulders) through the centre of the set to go clockwise around the directly opposite woman and return to place (again touching right hands/passing right shoulders)

Women briefly touch left hands (pass left shoulders) through the centre of the set to go anti-clockwise around the directly opposite man and return to place (again touching left hands/passing left shoulders)

Men briefly touch left hands (pass left shoulders) through the centre of the set to go anti-clockwise around the directly opposite woman and return to place (again touching left hands/passing left shoulders)

Women briefly touch right hands (pass right shoulders) through the centre of the set to go clockwise around the directly opposite man and return to place (again touching right hands/passing right shoulders)
Side with partner and back-to-back
Repeat siding and back-to-back

Clover leaf: Men go clockwise all the way (close in) around their partner then through the set (briefly touching right hands/passing by the right shoulder) to go clockwise around the original opposite woman (half-way)
Then continue back through the set (briefly touching right hands/passing by the right shoulder) to go clockwise all the way (close in) around the third woman (original neighbour) to finish at home

Clover leaf: Women go anti-clockwise all the way around their partner then through the set (briefly touching left hands/passing by the left shoulder) to go anti-clockwise around the original opposite man (halfway)
Then continue back through the set (briefly touching left hands/passing by the left shoulder) to go anticlockwise all the way around the third man (original neighbour) to finish at home
Arm right with partner and back-to-back
Arm left with partner and back-to-back
Men cast around partner to next man's position (anticlockwise, pulling left shoulder back), balance forward and back (into the centre)
Repeat cast and balance around the next two women, finishing at home
Women cast around partner to next woman's position (clockwise, pulling right shoulder back), balance forward and back (into the centre)
Repeat cast and balance around the next two men, finishing at home
All circle left, slip step
Back-to-back with partner
All circle right, slip step
Back-to-back with partner
